text: A flurry of shafts slows the enemy advance.
A good offense is a good defense.
The name of the Suns scares the enemy to their hearts.
Under the rule of Sun Jian and Ce, the Sun clan prospered each members worked together as one.
These men have risen under Han Sui's gaze and have been given a fit name.
Gao Lan will prove that he is unmatched in all of Hebei!
With Taoist rituals and chanting, Zhang Lu inspires his men to do the impossible.
With his reputation of sheer compassion and kindness, Liu Yu bolsters his men to continue the fight.
With his years of combat experience, Bao Xin truly leads by heavenly example.
Flee, villain, before the indomitable chucking of Chen Ying!
The lineage and heritage of the Yuan cannot be questioned!
Let the enemy charge falter against the unbroken formation of Gao Gan.
Gongsun Kang walks a tight balance, all in the name of his own ambitions.
The ambition and pride of Qu Yi is set to be reaped by friend and foe alike.
Fear the blade of a mistreated warlord, lest you be the one who rots in the very mud he crawled his way out of.
From the Heavens themselves, arrows pour on your hapless foes!
The forest provides a path, and surer footing, for the respectful.
Show the whelps before you the true might of the bows of the Xianbei!
The strongest of wolves leads the hunt.
If retreat is not an option, than make the enemy think you are fleeing.
Commit to your own path, and never back down.
Use wisdom to survive the harshest of enviornments.
A charge, fuelled by stern hearts and even sterner blades, will rip enemy lines apart.
Against our lines our opponents will break, like water scattering off the tortoise's shell.
Few can fathom exactly how Gan Ji can breathe out billowing flames from his very being, given they are usually burning to death seconds later.
With a single yell, Wang Yi disillusions all who draw blades against her.
With incomprehensible chanting and the waving of talismans and coins, Gan Ji invokes the God of Thunder to curse those he deems possessed by evil.
Now go away, or I shall taunt you a second time!
The masterful hands of Hua Tuo can cleanse the wounds and numb the pain of even those in the thick of battle.
Zuo Ci's chilling incantation gives his targets a frosty reception.
Those who breathe in this concoction can see things no one else can see, do things no one else can do.
The very northern winds guide the warrior's blade.
A discombobulating shout shakes the foe to their very bones.
From across the battlefield, a ferocious challenge is issued.
The rules of nature dictate the flow of war.
With force enough to split a boulder, the enemy lines are cleaved in twain!
Everyone is safe when this one is present. It's the one thing you can rely upon when all else is bogged down in murky politics.
Akin to a hungry hound breaking its leash,  Sun Quan eschews calmness in favour of rage!
